spanGrp.span: Our people came to Georgia in XIX century because of a very difficult life.
bizım halh gäldi ee gürjistana v devitnatsatom veke onučun ki čoğ čätınıdi yašamah
bizım halhada bir urus adam kömäk etti
As I have heard it was very hard, people were even dying from hunger and no water.
näsıl ki duimušum čoğ čätınıdi yolda öö ölierdi halh ajından su sulari yoğudi ičmäya
bir üč yuz bin adam ölmüšti
That’s why they came to Georgia.
And I also heard that they were on the way for two or three months.
näsıl genä duimušum iki üč ay yolda bunnar gäzierdılär
